snippet: Sunderland clambered off the bottom of the Premier League after Patrick van Aanholt's second-half goal secured what manager David Moyes described as a "massive" 1-0 victory over Watford at the Stadium of Light on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Sunderland clambered off the bottom of the Premier League after Patrick van Aanholt's second-half goal secured what manager David Moyes described as a "massive" 1-0 victory over Watford at the Stadium of Light on Saturday.

headline.main: Soccer-Sunderland Off Bottom as Van Aanholt Sinks Watford
headline.print_headline: Soccer-Sunderland Off Bottom as Van Aanholt Sinks Watford
